entry.title: $2000 // Quiet, very bright and sunny 1 bedroom apartment
entry.content:
CONTACT ME : TANYA show contact info
--------------------------------------------------
Newly clean, quiet, very bright and sunny 1 bedroom apartment with a separate kitchen with full size appliance & living room. The bedroom windows faces East 78th Street, has closets and fits a queen size bed.

This 4 story walk-up apartment building is located on a prime, tree lined quiet block in the heart of the upper east side section of Manhattan and is near all shopping, boutique stores, restaurants & schools.

* Pets Allowed
* Guarantors are accepted nationwide!

entry.title: $2300 // BRAND NEW GUT RENOVATED 1-BEDROOM APARTMENT
entry.content:
CONTACT ME : TANYA show contact info
--------------------------------------------------
Brand new gut renovated, drop dead gorgeous, quiet, clean, sun drenched 1 bedroom apartment with and a living room and open kitchen:

Kitchen:
* Top of the line stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and range
* Caesar stone counter tops, ceramic tile flooring with subway style tiled back splashes
* LG Washing and dryer in the apartment
* 42" Custom made cabinets with self closing doors
* Open bar to living room

Bathroom:
* 24" solid wood vanity
* High grade fixtures including porcelain tiles

Living room/bedroom:
* Sun light throughout the apartment
* 8 foot solid core closet doors with shelving in each bedroom and living room
* Wide planked first quality Oak flooring throughout
* Floor moldings throughout
* Recessed Lighting
* Bedroom fit full and/or queen size beds
* Bedroom has a closets and windows

This 4 story walk-up apartment building is located on a prime, tree lined quiet block in the heart of the upper east side section of Manhattan and is near all shopping, boutique stores, restaurants & schools.

* Pets Allowed
* Guarantors are accepted nationwide!
